channel.title: Teleports
channel.description: I know this sounds like a stupid question and im new to coding but i cant find where my teleports are to tele to the place and change the tele name if someone could help me that would me greatly appreciated bump i really need help

item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @craig187 craig187
item.description:
@craig187 wrote:

go into clickingmost.java

I am guessing your a delta noob so search for this

break;
case 73100:
case 4140:
case 50235:
c.triggerTele(3096+misc.random(3), 3502+misc.random(3), 0); <<< That is your tele home to change it change the cords
break;
case 9167:
if(c.teleEffect == 1)
c.triggerTele(2907, 9714, 0);
if(c.teleEffect == 2)
c.triggerTele(3020+misc.random(2), 4815+misc.random(2), 0);
break;
case 9168:
if(c.teleEffect == 1)
c.triggerTele(3244, 3518, 0);
if(c.teleEffect == 2)
c.closeInterface();
break;
case 9169:
if(c.teleEffect == 1)

item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Mason187 Mason187
item.description:
@Mason187 wrote:

alright thanks for the help just wondering how to do this
ill show the snippet
c.teleEffect = 1;
c.sendQuest(“Which Training area?”, 2470);
c.sendQuest(“Low Train”, 2471);
c.sendQuest(“Medium Train”, 2472);
c.sendQuest(“High Train”, 2473);
c.sendFrame164(2469);
break;
i just copied that off
c.teleEffect = 1;
c.sendQuest(“Which wild zone?”, 2470);
c.sendQuest(“Pk Box”, 2471);
c.sendQuest(“Varrock”, 2472);
c.sendQuest(“Mage bank”, 2473);
c.sendFrame164(2469);
break;

how do i change where it all teleports to?
these are the locations i wish to teleport to
1945 5003
2124 4913
2093 3217

Read full topic

item.title: Teleports

text for other things are in texthandler…

item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

To change the location of the teleport: Go to clickingmost.java and ctrl+f the original coords

To change the name of the teleport: Go to the TextHandler.java and ctrl+f the original name

Read full topic

oooh sory, go into texthandler and find the teleport name that you want to change, and change it to whatever name you want it to be

item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @teh_war_of_noobs teh war of noobs
item.description:
@teh_war_of_noobs wrote:

ok so in your source folder find Client.Java, press Ctrl+F and you’ll get a search box, put in w/e the teleport name is you want to change. Example this is my command that i want to change:

}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“telename”)&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“telename”)){ //Voule Command Generator
teleportToX = CordX;
teleportToY = CordY;
sendMessage(“what it says when you teleport to the place.”);
